name: Ext_R5_Coverage_subscriberId
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Coverage.subscriberId for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Coverage.subscriberId from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Coverage|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The insurer assigned ID for the Subscriber.
element.comment: `Coverage.subscriberId` maps to R4B `Coverage`. To multiple elements in Coverage: (`Coverage`, `Coverage.subscriberId`). Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Coverage.subscriberId` maps to R4B `Coverage.subscriberId`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
